item.description: When it's chilly outside, come play indoors! Often pets won't get as much exercise in the dead of winter when the weather is bad. Therefore Best Friends in Rocky Hill is hosting an indoor playgroup for dogs! All friendly dogs are welcome to socialize. We provide a large playroom, water, toys, and clean up. It's a great experience for both dogs and people to make new friends...there will be goody bags for your pets and refreshments for humans too! Please be sure to check with your vet that your pet is up to date on vaccine because they will be interacting with other pets. We hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: please check in at the front desk

group.name: The Rocky Hill "All Breed" Meetup Group

item.name: Winter Wonderland
